channel.title: Welcome to my blog :)
channel.description: Recent content on Welcome to my blog :)

item.title: CEH Practical Exam Review + Preparation (March 2022)
item.description: Hello, everyone! This is my review of the Certified Ethical Hacker (C|EH) Practical exam, which I passed with a perfect score of 20/20 and only took around 1h30min of the 6 hours to complete. NOTE: I won’t be mentioning the exact questions I got for the exam because of NDA but I assure you everything you need to pass the exam is here. So let me tell you a short story about how I ended up getting a voucher for this exam.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, The reason I created this blog is to document my learning journey and experience in the field of information security. Youâ€™ll find content here about: writeups/walkthroughs about boxes I do for TryHackMe, HackTheBox, and Vulnhub, and other interesting things that I may write about. I may not be the best writer, but I hope the information you find here may be of any help to you. JS|NX7
